main_title: HOW MUCH DOES IT COST TO RENT A PROPERTY IN BRUSSELS?
test_description: Whether you are a current or future tenant or landlord, this site will allow you to find out the indicative reference rent for the property you rent or plan to rent, taking into account its location and main characteristics.
info_box_text: The rent grid website has been updated to make the calculation of the reference rent more transparent.

CalculatorPage.regionalService: BRUSSELS REGIONAL PUBLIC SERVICE - BRUSSELS HOUSING
CalculatorPage.title: Indicative Rent Calculator
CalculatorPage.description: Estimate the reference rent for a property in Brussels based on its characteristics
CalculatorPage.footer: © 2023 Brussels Regional Public Service - Brussels Housing. All rights reserved.

PropertyTypeStep.title: What type of property do you want to rent?

PropertyDetailsStep.title: Property Characteristics
PropertyDetailsStep.description: Indicate the details of your property

EnergyStep.title: Energy and Heating
EnergyStep.demoModeAlert: Demo mode: Address data is not available. A default difficulty index will be used for the calculation.

AddressStep.title: Property Address
AddressStep.description: Enter the full address of the property in Brussels
AddressStep.demoModeAlert: Demo mode: Address data is not available. A default difficulty index will be used for the calculation.

initialInsertError.title: Error:
initialInsertError.message: Could not save the initial estimate. Please try again later. ({error})

ResultStep.title: Estimation Result
ResultStep.description: Here is the indicative rent for this property
ResultStep.priceRangeTooltip: According to Brussels legislation, the reference rent can vary by ±20%

actualRentSection.title: Confirm your current rent
actualRentSection.description: Help us improve our estimates and contact you if needed by sharing your current rent and contact details (optional).
actualRentSection.errorMessage: Error during update. Please check the amount and try again.

calculationMethod.title: Calculation Method
calculationMethod.description: The reference rent is calculated according to the official formula of the Brussels-Capital Region, which takes into account the type of property, its surface area, the number of bedrooms, the condition of the property, and the neighborhood difficulty index.

importantInfo.title: Important Information
importantInfo.description1: The reference rent is not binding. Outside of specific regulatory frameworks, the rent amount is freely determined by the landlord on the private market.
importantInfo.description2: However, the reference rent must be mentioned in addition to the actual rent in residential leases in the Brussels-Capital Region.

error.insufficientQuery: Please enter at least the street name
error.noResults: No address found. Please try another search.

AddressAutocomplete.demoModeAlert: Demo mode: Use the 'Enter manually' option to enter an address.
